title: New memecoin on BNB Chain MUBARAK up over 100% over the week, buoyed by CZ’s support
body: The new memecoin Mubarak has sparked a trading frenzy on Binance Smart Chain, fueled by Changpeng Zhao’s support and its recent listing on Binance Alpha. Memecoin trading on Binance Smart Chain ( BNB ) is enjoying a revival, thanks to the recent addition of the new memecoin Mubarak (MUBARAK). As of press time, MUBARAK is trading for $0.16, up by about 106% over the past week, according to Coinmarketcap . Yesterday, MUBARAK briefly claimed the the top spot on BNB Chain memecoin by market capitalization ranking, with its trading volume exceeding $180 million, as reported by Root Data . Although it has since ceded the top spot, MUBARAK remains firmly in the top 5 BSC memecoins by market cap, with its market capitalization currently at $159 million. Source: BNB Chain DappBay The rally in MUBARAK could be attributed to two main catalysts. First, MUBARAK was recently listed on Binance Alpha. Secondly, Changpeng Zhao recently purchased 20,150 MUBARAK for 1BNB, which was valued at $600 at the time of the transaction. Today, Zhao also changed his profile picture on X to a photo of him wearing traditional Arab dress. Source: SZ’s X profile However, Zhao downplayed his role in the token’s rally, stating: “People give me too much credit. I didn’t have any magic for any of the wonderful things happening. It’s builders building for years. I know only a handful of words in Arabic, but I am happy that I may have “inspired” millions of people to learn a few words, too.” You might also like: CZ receives more BNB after LIBRA donation, pledges to aid TST and BROCCOLI victims Whether Zhao’s purchase directly fueled this rally or not, his investment into MUBARAK is still a noteworthy development. Just recently, Zhao stated that he hadn’t invested in memecoins when Test (TST) was pumping on BNB following its appearance in a tutorial video. This suggests that MUBARAK could be his first memecoin investment, making it no surprise that the token has seen such a massive pump after Zhao’s purchase. The surge in trading activity driven by MUBARAK and other new tokens is a positive development for BNB Chain, a sentiment that was echoed by Harrison Seletsky during the TST’s rally in February, stating that “More memecoin trading would be a welcome addition to the BNB Chain ecosystem, attracting more users, increasing liquidity, and further engaging the existing community.” You might also like: Matrixport: Memecoin market still in a slump despite global liquidity improving

title: Revolutionary Blockchain Credit Ratings: Untangled Finance & Moody’s Pilot Unveiled
body: Are you ready for a seismic shift in the DeFi landscape? Imagine a world where the trusted pillars of traditional finance are seamlessly integrated with the innovative realm of blockchain. That’s precisely what’s unfolding as Untangled Finance, in collaboration with Moody’s Ratings, has successfully completed a groundbreaking pilot, injecting credit ratings directly into the blockchain ecosystem. This isn’t just incremental progress; it’s a transformative leap that promises to redefine risk assessment and transparency within decentralized finance and beyond. Why Blockchain Needs Credit Ratings? The world of DeFi , or decentralized finance, is built on the promise of open, permissionless, and transparent financial systems. However, one of the persistent challenges has been effectively evaluating risk. Unlike traditional finance, where institutions rely on established mechanisms like credit ratings from agencies like Moody’s, DeFi protocols have largely operated in a ratings vacuum. This lack of standardized risk assessment has often been cited as a barrier to wider institutional adoption and mainstream user confidence. Think about it – would you lend your assets to a protocol if you had no clear way to gauge its risk profile? This is where the integration of credit ratings becomes a game-changer. Consider these points: Enhanced Transparency: Blockchain thrives on transparency, but risk assessment hasn’t always kept pace. Bringing credit ratings onto the blockchain provides a clear, accessible, and immutable record of assessed risk, fostering greater trust among users and investors. Improved Efficiency: Currently, DeFi protocols often rely on complex and sometimes opaque methods for risk evaluation. Integrating established credit ratings streamlines this process, making risk assessment more efficient and readily understandable. Bridge to Traditional Finance: For DeFi to truly go mainstream, it needs to bridge the gap with traditional finance. Incorporating familiar tools like credit ratings helps build this bridge, making DeFi more palatable and understandable for traditional financial institutions. Informed Decision Making: Users and protocols alike can make more informed decisions when armed with reliable credit ratings . Lenders can assess the risk of borrowers, and protocols can better manage their own risk profiles, leading to a more robust and stable DeFi ecosystem. Untangled Finance and Moody’s: Pioneering Blockchain Integration Untangled Finance, a decentralized protocol specializing in lending and liquidity using real-world assets as collateral, is at the forefront of this revolution. Their collaboration with Moody’s Ratings isn’t just a partnership; it’s a strategic alliance aimed at fundamentally altering how risk is perceived and managed in the blockchain space. The successful completion of their proof of concept (POC) is a significant milestone, demonstrating the feasibility and potential of integrating Moody’s credit ratings into Untangled’s risk oracle system, Credio. Let’s delve deeper into what this POC entails: Feature Description Benefit Credio Integration Moody’s credit ratings are integrated into Untangled’s Credio risk oracle system. Provides a decentralized and transparent source of credit risk information on-chain. Real-World Asset Collateral Untangled Finance uses real-world assets as collateral for lending. Brings stability and tangible value to DeFi lending, backed by assets outside the crypto realm. Enhanced Risk Evaluation DeFi protocols and applications can access and utilize Moody’s credit ratings for risk assessment. Leads to more informed lending and borrowing decisions, reducing risks and improving market efficiency. Transparency and Auditability All credit rating data on the blockchain is transparent and auditable. Builds trust and confidence in the system, ensuring data integrity and preventing manipulation. The Untapped Potential of DeFi and Credit Ratings The implications of this pilot extend far beyond just Untangled Finance. Integrating credit ratings into the blockchain unlocks a plethora of opportunities across the DeFi ecosystem and even broader blockchain applications. Imagine decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) using on-chain credit ratings to assess the financial health of potential partners, or NFT platforms utilizing ratings to evaluate the risk associated with fractionalized ownership. The possibilities are vast and largely untapped. Consider these potential use cases: DeFi Lending and Borrowing: Protocols can use credit ratings to adjust interest rates based on borrower risk, creating a more dynamic and efficient lending market. DAO Governance: DAOs can leverage credit ratings to make informed decisions about treasury management, investments, and partnerships, enhancing governance efficiency and risk mitigation. NFT Marketplaces: Fractionalized NFTs and NFT-backed loans can benefit from credit ratings , providing investors with a clearer understanding of the underlying asset’s risk profile. Supply Chain Finance: Blockchain -based supply chains can incorporate credit ratings to assess the financial stability of participants, reducing risk and improving trust in the supply chain ecosystem. Navigating the Challenges Ahead While the successful pilot is a major step forward, challenges remain in fully realizing the potential of blockchain credit ratings . One key challenge is standardization. Ensuring that credit ratings are consistently and accurately represented on different blockchains and across various protocols is crucial for widespread adoption. Interoperability between different blockchain networks is also essential to allow seamless access to and utilization of these ratings across the entire ecosystem. Furthermore, educating users and protocols about the value and interpretation of blockchain credit ratings will be vital for driving adoption and maximizing their impact. Key challenges include: Standardization: Developing industry-wide standards for representing and utilizing credit ratings on the blockchain is crucial for interoperability and consistency. Interoperability: Ensuring seamless access to credit ratings across different blockchain networks to avoid fragmentation and maximize utility. User Education: Educating users and protocols on how to interpret and effectively use blockchain credit ratings to make informed decisions. Data Privacy and Security: Balancing the need for transparent credit ratings with data privacy and security concerns, especially when dealing with sensitive financial information. Actionable Insights: Embracing the Future of Risk Assessment The Untangled Finance and Moody’s pilot is more than just a news story; it’s a call to action for the DeFi community and the broader financial world. For developers and protocol designers, it highlights the importance of integrating robust risk assessment mechanisms into their platforms. For investors and users, it signals the emergence of more sophisticated tools for evaluating risk and making informed decisions. And for traditional financial institutions, it offers a glimpse into the transformative potential of blockchain to enhance transparency and efficiency in risk management. Here are some actionable insights: For DeFi Protocols: Explore integrating credit rating oracles like Credio to enhance your risk assessment capabilities and attract institutional capital. For Investors: Look for DeFi protocols that are proactively incorporating risk assessment tools like credit ratings as indicators of maturity and responsible management. For Traditional Finance: Monitor the development of blockchain credit ratings as a potential avenue for bridging the gap between traditional and decentralized finance, and for improving risk transparency in your own operations. Conclusion: A New Era of Trust in Blockchain The successful pilot by Untangled Finance and Moody’s marks a pivotal moment in the evolution of blockchain and DeFi . By bringing the established credibility of credit ratings onto the decentralized ledger, they are paving the way for a more transparent, efficient, and ultimately, trustworthy financial ecosystem. This is not just about improving risk assessment; it’s about building a future where DeFi can confidently step into the mainstream, empowered by the robust foundations of both traditional finance and cutting-edge blockchain innovation. The integration of credit ratings is a powerful step towards unlocking the full potential of decentralized finance and fostering a new era of trust in the digital economy. To learn more about the latest DeFi trends, explore our article on key developments shaping DeFi institutional adoption.

title: Active Stablecoin Wallets Surge Over 50% in One Year: Report
body: The number of active stablecoin wallets has surged by over 50% in the past year, reflecting growing adoption and engagement within the digital asset ecosystem, according to a joint report by onchain analytics platforms Artemis and Dune . Titled “The State of Stablecoins 2025: Supply, Adoption & Market Trends,” the report reveals that active stablecoin addresses increased from 19.6 million in February 2024 to 30 million in February 2025, marking a 53% year-on-year growth. Analysts suggest that this rise indicates a broader shift toward stablecoins as a key bridge between traditional finance and crypto. Institutional and DeFi Adoption Drives Growth The report attributes the increase in active stablecoin wallets to growing institutional adoption, expanding use in payments, and rising integration in decentralized finance (DeFi). These factors have made stablecoins a fundamental component of the digital economy, offering liquidity, stability, and accessibility to users worldwide. Beyond active addresses, the total stablecoin supply has also surged. In February 2024, the total supply stood at $138 billion, but by February 2025, it had climbed to $225 billion, reflecting a 63% year-on-year increase. Given that stablecoins are pegged to fiat currencies, their market capitalization mirrors their total supply, reinforcing their increasing role in financial transactions. Stablecoin usage has expanded not only in supply but also in transaction volume. Good Morning, Today, the Federal Reserve is meeting a potential inflection point for stablecoin dominance, which typically moves inversely to crypto. Essentially, when stablecoin dominance rises, crypto is being sold off in favor of stablecoins, and when it falls, crypto is… https://t.co/Dkcx9RF7ja pic.twitter.com/To0KmjjG4K — Miad Kasravi (@ZFXtrading) March 19, 2025 The report highlights that monthly transfer volume grew from $1.9 trillion in February 2024 to $4.1 trillion in February 2025, representing a 115% annual increase. The peak occurred in December 2024, when stablecoin transaction volume hit $5.1 trillion, before experiencing a slight decline in early 2025. Over the past year, stablecoins facilitated a total of $35 trillion in transfers, underscoring their critical role in digital finance. While most metrics saw significant increases, average transfer size remained relatively stable, rising slightly from $676,000 in 2024 to $683,000 in 2025. However, notable spikes occurred in May ($2.6 million) and July ($2.2 million), suggesting periods of heightened whale or institutional activity. Analysts at Artemis and Dune believe these fluctuations highlight the dual use of stablecoins in both retail transactions and large-scale institutional movements. Stablecoins Play an Important Role in Financial Ecosystem Last month, Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller weighed in on stablecoins , arguing that U.S. dollar-pegged digital assets could strengthen the dollar’s global dominance. Waller claimed that stablecoins already play an important role in the financial ecosystem. They provide a stable store of value for crypto traders, facilitate access to US dollars in high-inflation economies, enable faster cross-border payments, and have shown early but promising use cases in retail transactions. Prior to that, while speaking at the Atlantic Council , Waller referred to stablecoins as “synthetic dollars”, comparing them to commercial bank money and highlighting their ability to open up new payment possibilities. He noted that if stablecoins can foster competition, broaden financial inclusion, reduce transaction costs, and make payments faster and more efficient, then they should be embraced. More recently, Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell affirmed the central bank’s support for developing a regulatory framework around stablecoins during a Senate hearing. The post Active Stablecoin Wallets Surge Over 50% in One Year: Report appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Cardano price prediction 2025-2031: Will ADA recover to $3 soon?
body: Key takeaways : Cardano’s price is expected to reach $1.04 in 2025. By 2028, ADA/USD could decline and reach $3.03 By 2031, Cardano might reach a maximum price of $10.11 Cardano is a third-generation blockchain platform launched in 2017 by Ethereum co-founder Charles Hoskinson. Designed for decentralized applications and smart contracts, it uses Ouroboros—a unique, energy-efficient Proof of Stake consensus mechanism. Cardano’s two-layer architecture separates transactions from smart contracts, enhancing scalability and flexibility. Its native cryptocurrency, ADA, is used for transaction fees, staking, and governance, allowing holders to influence the platform’s future. Emphasizing a research-driven, peer-reviewed development approach, Cardano aims to tackle blockchain challenges like scalability and sustainability, making it a strong alternative to platforms like Ethereum. Perhaps you’re wondering: with its innovative technology, can Cardano’s ADA reach new all-time highs soon? Let’s uncover what the future holds for Cardano. Bollinger Bands show contraction, suggesting reduced volatility, while the RSI at 46.93 indicates neutral momentum, neither overbought nor oversold. ADA has struggled to break above resistance levels after recent declines, reflecting a weak bullish push. A move above $0.780 could indicate renewed bullish momentum, while failure to hold $0.535 may trigger further declines. Traders should watch volume spikes and RSI movements for confirmation of trend direction, as ADA remains in a consolidation phase. ADA price analysis 4-hour chart ADA/USD 4-hour Chart Based on the 4-hour Cardano (ADA) chart, the price hovers around $0.708, with resistance at $0.740 and support near $0.685. The Bollinger Bands show tightening, indicating a period of low volatility. The MACD is flat at -0.007, signaling a lack of momentum, while the Balance of Power (-0.80) suggests bearish dominance. If ADA breaks above $0.740, a push toward $0.780 could occur, but failure to hold $0.685 may lead to a further pullback. Volume levels and MACD crossover signals should be watched for potential trend shifts. ADA is currently in consolidation with slight bearish bias. The Bollinger Bands on the daily chart indicate reduced volatility, while the RSI (46.93) suggests a neutral stance with no strong overbought or oversold conditions. The MACD on the 4-hour chart is flat, showing weak momentum, while the Balance of Power (-0.80) suggests bearish dominance. A break above $0.740 could push ADA toward $0.780, while losing $0.685 may result in a further decline. The trend remains sideways with slight bearish pressure. Is Cardano a good investment? Cardano (ADA) presents a mixed investment opportunity. It is a third-generation blockchain that aims to solve scalability issues and enhance security through its Proof-of-Stake mechanism. While some analysts predict significant price increases by 2030, others caution that it remains a high-risk investment due to the volatile nature of the crypto market. Investors should consider their risk tolerance and research before investing, as Cardano’s future performance is uncertain and contingent on market conditions and technological advancements. What will Cardano be worth in 2025? ADA might reach a maximum price of $1.04, with an average trading price of about $0.8992 and a minimum price of $0.8660. What will Cardano be worth in 2030? In 2030, ADA’s average forecast price could be $6.05. Its minimum and maximum trading price is expected to be $5.84 and $6.95, respectively. What is the Cardano forecast for 2040? Predicting Cardano’s (ADA) price in 2040 is highly speculative as it depends on multiple factors, including adoption, regulatory developments, technological advancements, and macroeconomic conditions. However, if Cardano continues its development in smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and blockchain efficiency, it could see widespread adoption, driving its price higher. Some optimistic projections suggest that ADA could reach double-digit prices, possibly ranging from $10 to $50 or more, if the cryptocurrency market continues to expand and Cardano establishes itself as a leader in blockchain technology. However, in a bearish scenario, where regulatory hurdles and competition slow down its progress, ADA could struggle to maintain high valuations. What will be the future price of Cardano in 2050? Predicting Cardano’s (ADA) price in 2050 is highly speculative, but if blockchain adoption continues to grow and Cardano successfully scales its smart contract ecosystem, its price could see significant appreciation. In a bullish scenario, ADA could reach $50 to $100 or even higher if it becomes a dominant blockchain platform with real-world utility in finance, governance, and enterprise solutions. However, in a bearish scenario where adoption stagnates or regulations hinder growth, ADA could remain below $10. The price will depend on mass adoption, technological advancements, global regulations, and overall cryptocurrency market trends over the coming decades. Will Cardano recover? Cardano’s recovery potential depends on market sentiment and adoption. Despite past challenges, its projected price increase in 2024, potentially reaching $1, has significantly bolstered confidence in the coin’s future. Will Cardano reach $5? Based on our analysis, Cardano is likely to reach $5 by 2030, with a forecasted range of around $5.84. This projection is driven by Cardano’s continued technological advancements, growing adoption, strategic partnerships, and increasing market confidence, indicating a positive long-term growth trajectory for the cryptocurrency market. Will Cardano reach $10? ADA is predicted to reach $10 by 2031. By this time, the coin is expected to attain a maximum price of $10.11 Will Cardano reach $50? Cardano is trading around $0.6, with an all-time high of $2.80 in early 2021. While not impossible, reaching $50 in the next few years is highly uncertain. Does Cardano have a good long-term future? Cardano (ADA) has the potential for a positive long-term future, primarily driven by its technological advancements and growing ecosystem. Predictions indicate that by 2030, Cardano could see significant growth, with estimates suggesting a rise to around $9. The platform’s unique features, such as its focus on scalability and partnerships with various institutions, position it well for future adoption. However, its success will depend on overcoming regulatory scrutiny and developer engagement challenges. Recent news/opinion on Cardano The Cardano Builder Fest #2 is scheduled for April 2025 in Vietnam. Developer Andrew Westberg has proposed reducing the treasury tax from 20% to 10%, which has been the subject of much discussion. Some argue that this would boost staking incentives and short-term price growth, while others worry about its impact on Cardano’s long-term sustainability. According to a Feb 24 notice, the U.S. SEC has acknowledged NYSE Arca’s filing for a spot Cardano ETF, starting a 240-day review process. The proposal seeks to list and trade shares of the Grayscale Cardano Trust under NYSE Arca Rule 8.201-E. If approved, the trust will offer ADA exposure without direct ownership, with shares tracking ADA’s value across Coinbase, Kraken, Crypto.com, and Bitfinex. The filing was submitted through a 19b-4 form, marking the 60th crypto ETF filing this year. By 2026, Cardano’s price could trade at a maximum of $1.19 Cardano’s historic price sentiment Cardano price history Cardano was founded in 2015 and went live in 2017. It initially gained investor support and popularity for being affordable and environmentally friendly due to its unique PoS mechanism called Ouroboros. In 2021, Cardano implemented the smart contract feature with the Alonzo update. This update came on the ADA test network and brought the interoperability and scalability that was promised to the users earlier. The ADA price reached its all-time high during the bullish cycle of 2021 when it hit $3.09. However, its price started plummeting at the beginning of September 2021 and reached a low of $0.220 in June 2023. In 2024, Cardano peaked at $0.810 in March before dropping to $0.401 in April due to heavy selling. It traded between $0.52–$0.401 in April and $0.317–$0.423 by July, with strong support at $0.33 in August. After peaking at $0.37 in September and dipping to $0.33 in November, ADA surged to $1.1999 at the start of December, hit a maximum price of $1.3264, and closed the year at $0.8451. In January 2025, Cardano is trading between $1.02 and $1.09. However, the closing price for Cardano in January was $0.9. As of February 2025, ADA is trading at $0.89. ADA value dropped further in March as it dipped to the $0.60 range.

title: Generous Justin Sun’s Unprecedented Pledge: Donating All Tron Memecoin Profits & Covering Losses
body: In a surprising turn of events that has sent ripples through the crypto community, Tron founder Justin Sun has made a generous pledge. He announced his commitment to donate all profits generated from memecoins launched on the Tron network. Adding another layer of reassurance, Sun also vowed to personally cover any losses incurred by users engaging with these digital assets. This unprecedented move aims to foster trust and excitement within the burgeoning memecoin ecosystem on Tron. But what exactly does this mean for the future of memecoins and the Tron network? Let’s delve deeper into this fascinating development. Justin Sun’s Bold Pledge: A New Era for Tron Memecoins? Justin Sun , a prominent figure in the cryptocurrency world and the founder of Tron, has consistently aimed to innovate and expand the Tron ecosystem. His recent announcement regarding memecoins marks a significant strategic shift. According to his statement on X (formerly Twitter), his “first rule” for venturing into memecoins on Tron is to operate without seeking personal profit. This is a noteworthy departure from the typical motivations behind memecoin creation, which are often driven by hype and rapid financial gains for creators. Sun’s approach is refreshingly different, positioning him as a benefactor rather than a beneficiary in this volatile market. Here’s a breakdown of Justin Sun’s pledge: No Personal Profit: Sun explicitly stated that he will not profit from memecoin ventures on the Tron network. This altruistic approach is designed to build confidence and attract users who might be wary of typical memecoin schemes. Donation of All Profits: All proceeds generated from these memecoin initiatives will be channeled towards donations. While the specifics of the donation recipients are yet to be fully detailed, this commitment suggests a philanthropic direction for Tron’s memecoin activities. Loss Coverage: Perhaps the most striking aspect of the pledge is Sun’s promise to personally absorb any losses experienced by users interacting with Tron-based memecoins. This safety net is a significant reassurance in the notoriously risky world of memecoin trading. Understanding the Buzz Around Tron Memecoins The concept of Tron memecoins has gained traction recently, especially with the rise of platforms like SunPump. Memecoins, cryptocurrencies inspired by internet memes and viral trends, are known for their community-driven nature and often unpredictable price surges. While they carry substantial risk, they also offer the potential for explosive growth, attracting a diverse range of investors and enthusiasts. Tron, with its robust blockchain infrastructure and active community, presents a fertile ground for memecoin experimentation. Key Characteristics of Tron Memecoins: Community-Driven: Like most memecoins, those on Tron thrive on community engagement and social media buzz. Accessibility: Tron’s network is known for its relatively low transaction fees and fast processing times, making it accessible for memecoin trading. Innovation Hub: Tron is positioning itself as a platform for crypto innovation, and memecoins are becoming a part of this narrative. Volatility: It’s crucial to remember that memecoins are inherently volatile and investing in them carries significant risks, even with Sun’s pledge. The Allure of Memecoin Profits and the Donation Promise The promise of memecoin profits is a significant driver for many participants in the crypto market. Memecoins, despite their whimsical nature, have created substantial wealth for some early investors. Dogecoin and Shiba Inu are prime examples of memecoins that defied expectations and reached billion-dollar market capitalizations. Justin Sun’s initiative taps into this allure, but with a twist. By pledging to donate all profits, he introduces a philanthropic dimension to the often speculative world of memecoins. Potential Benefits of Donating Memecoin Profits: Benefit Description Positive Image for Tron Donating profits can enhance Tron’s reputation as a socially responsible blockchain platform. Community Engagement It can attract a broader community that is interested in both crypto and charitable giving. Unique Selling Proposition This approach differentiates Tron from other blockchains and memecoin platforms, offering a unique value proposition. Potential for Mainstream Attention The philanthropic aspect can attract media attention beyond the crypto sphere, increasing mainstream awareness of Tron. Addressing Concerns: Covering Tron Network Losses One of the most significant concerns surrounding memecoins is the potential for substantial financial losses. The market is rife with examples of memecoins that have experienced dramatic price crashes, leaving many investors with significant losses. Justin Sun’s commitment to cover Tron network losses associated with these memecoins is an unprecedented step to mitigate this risk. This pledge aims to create a safer environment for users to explore the memecoin space on Tron. Understanding the Loss Coverage Pledge: Personal Responsibility: Sun is taking personal responsibility for potential losses, indicating a strong commitment to user protection. Building Trust: This move is likely intended to build trust and confidence in the Tron ecosystem, especially for newcomers to memecoins. Risk Mitigation: While it doesn’t eliminate risk entirely, it significantly reduces the downside for users, making participation in Tron memecoins less daunting. Unprecedented Support: No other major figure in the crypto space has offered such direct financial support to users in the memecoin domain. SunPump: The Epicenter of Memecoin Mania on Tron SunPump has emerged as a prominent platform within the Tron ecosystem, specifically focused on memecoin issuance and trading. On-chain analyst Onchain Lens reported a staggering statistic: daily memecoin issuance on SunPump has surpassed 100 tokens. This highlights the explosive growth and fervent activity within the Tron memecoin space. SunPump serves as a hub for creators and traders looking to engage with the memecoin phenomenon on the Tron blockchain. SunPump Highlights: High Issuance Rate: Over 100 memecoins issued daily indicates a vibrant and rapidly evolving ecosystem. Tron-Based: Leverages Tron’s infrastructure for fast and cost-effective transactions. Community Focus: Designed to cater to the memecoin community, fostering creation, trading, and engagement. Potential Risks: High issuance also suggests a high degree of speculation and potential risk, requiring users to exercise caution and due diligence. Conclusion: A Generous Gamble or a Masterstroke? Justin Sun’s pledge to donate all memecoin profits and cover losses is undoubtedly a bold and unprecedented move in the cryptocurrency world. It presents a fascinating experiment in blending memecoin hype with philanthropic goals and user protection. Whether this strategy will be a resounding success or a risky gamble remains to be seen. However, it has undeniably injected fresh excitement and a unique narrative into the Tron ecosystem, potentially attracting a new wave of users and setting a new precedent for social responsibility in the crypto space. As the memecoin landscape continues to evolve, Justin Sun’s approach will be closely watched and analyzed for its impact on Tron and the broader crypto community. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin price action.

title: Crucial Asia FX Outlook: Markets Brace for Fed Decision as BOJ Holds Steady
body: In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency and digital assets, understanding the broader macroeconomic landscape is absolutely crucial. And right now, all eyes are on Asia’s currency markets as they navigate the choppy waters of global economic policy. Today, we’re diving deep into the factors influencing Asia FX , with a particular focus on the looming Federal Reserve (Fed) decision and the Bank of Japan’s (BOJ) recent rate announcement. For crypto enthusiasts, understanding these traditional market movements is vital, as they often foreshadow trends and volatility in the digital asset space. Let’s decode what’s happening and what it could mean for your crypto portfolio. Asia FX on Edge: What’s Causing the Muted Movement? You might be wondering why Asia FX seems to be holding its breath. Well, the answer lies in the anticipation of a major event: the US Federal Reserve’s upcoming interest rate decision. Currency markets, particularly in Asia, are notoriously sensitive to signals from the world’s largest economy. When the Fed speaks, the global financial world listens, and Asia FX is no exception. Here’s a breakdown of the key factors contributing to the current muted movement: Uncertainty around the Fed’s Stance: Is the Fed going to hike rates again, pause, or even hint at future cuts? This uncertainty is the primary driver of the current cautious sentiment in currency markets . Traders are hesitant to make big moves until they get a clearer signal from the Fed. BOJ’s Steady Hand: The Bank of Japan (BOJ) recently announced its decision to hold BOJ rates steady. While this was widely expected, it removes one potential source of volatility from the equation, at least for now. However, the market is still scrutinizing the BOJ’s forward guidance for any hints of future policy shifts. Global Economic Headwinds: Beyond central bank decisions, broader global economic concerns are also weighing on Asia FX . Slowing global growth, persistent inflation in some regions, and geopolitical tensions all contribute to a risk-averse environment, leading to less decisive movements in currency valuations. Data Dependency: Central banks, including the Fed, are increasingly data-dependent. This means economic data releases leading up to the Fed decision are being intensely analyzed for clues about the Fed’s likely course of action. This data-driven approach adds another layer of uncertainty and can contribute to market indecision. Decoding the Fed Decision: Why Does it Matter for Asia FX and Crypto? The Federal Reserve’s Fed decision is not just a US event; it has ripple effects across the globe, especially in Asia. Here’s why this decision is so critical for Asia FX and, indirectly, for the cryptocurrency market: Impact on Asia FX: US Dollar Strength: A hawkish Fed (indicating further rate hikes or a prolonged period of high rates) typically strengthens the US dollar. Since many Asian currencies are closely linked to the dollar, a stronger dollar can put downward pressure on Asia FX values. Capital Flows: Higher US interest rates can attract capital away from Asian economies and towards the US, seeking higher returns. This outflow of capital can weaken Asian currencies. Trade Dynamics: Currency fluctuations impact trade competitiveness. Significant shifts in Asia FX relative to the US dollar can alter the balance of trade between Asian nations and the United States. Indirect Impact on Crypto: Risk Sentiment: Generally, a hawkish Fed and a stronger dollar can dampen risk sentiment across global markets, including crypto. Conversely, a dovish Fed (indicating potential rate cuts) can boost risk appetite, potentially benefiting crypto assets. Dollar Hegemony: The US dollar remains the dominant currency in global trade and finance, including the crypto market. Fed policy and dollar strength influence the pricing and trading dynamics of cryptocurrencies, many of which are paired against the USD. Macroeconomic Context: Crypto, while often touted as an alternative asset class, is not entirely immune to macroeconomic forces. Broader economic uncertainty driven by central bank policies can impact investor sentiment and flows into and out of the crypto market. BOJ Holds Rates: A Sign of Stability or Underlying Concerns? The Bank of Japan’s (BOJ) decision to maintain its ultra-loose monetary policy and hold BOJ rates steady was largely anticipated. For years, the BOJ has been battling deflation and struggling to generate sustained inflation. While holding rates provides a degree of stability, it also raises questions about the long-term sustainability of this approach. Let’s consider the implications: Potential Benefits of Steady BOJ Rates: Currency Stability (For Now): Maintaining low interest rates can prevent sharp appreciation of the Japanese Yen, which could harm Japan’s export-oriented economy. This stability can have a calming effect on broader Asia FX markets. Support for Domestic Economy: Low borrowing costs can support businesses and consumers in Japan, helping to stimulate economic activity, albeit at a slow pace. Contrast with Global Tightening: The BOJ’s dovish stance stands in contrast to many other central banks globally that are aggressively tightening monetary policy to combat inflation. This divergence can create unique dynamics in global currency markets . Potential Challenges of Prolonged Low Rates: Yen Weakness: The flip side of preventing Yen appreciation is potential Yen weakness. A persistently weak Yen can lead to imported inflation, making goods and services more expensive for Japanese consumers. Inflation Target Struggles: Despite years of ultra-loose policy, the BOJ has struggled to consistently achieve its 2% inflation target. Prolonged low rates may not be sufficient to overcome structural deflationary pressures. Policy Divergence Risks: The growing divergence between the BOJ’s policy and that of other major central banks could create distortions and vulnerabilities in global financial markets over the long term. Navigating Currency Markets in an Uncertain Landscape: Actionable Insights So, what does all of this mean for you, especially if you’re involved in the crypto space or interested in currency markets ? Here are some actionable insights to consider: For Crypto Investors: Monitor Fed Communication Closely: Pay attention to the Fed’s statements and press conferences following their decision. Look for clues about their future policy path, as this will significantly influence risk sentiment and dollar strength, both of which impact crypto. Diversify and Hedge: Consider diversifying your portfolio across different asset classes, including traditional currencies and commodities. Hedging strategies can help mitigate potential volatility arising from Fed decision outcomes and interest rates fluctuations. Stay Informed on Macro Trends: Keep abreast of global macroeconomic developments, including inflation data, economic growth indicators, and central bank policies. These factors provide the broader context for both traditional and crypto markets. For Forex Traders Focused on Asia FX: Analyze Asian Central Bank Responses: While the Fed and BOJ are key, also monitor the responses of other Asian central banks to these global developments. Their actions will shape the trajectory of Asia FX . Technical and Fundamental Analysis: Combine technical analysis of currency charts with fundamental analysis of economic data and central bank announcements to make informed trading decisions. Manage Risk Prudently: Volatility is inherent in currency markets , especially during periods of central bank announcements. Employ robust risk management strategies, including stop-loss orders and appropriate position sizing. The Road Ahead for Asia FX: Patience and Preparation are Key In conclusion, Asia FX is currently in a holding pattern, largely influenced by the anticipation surrounding the Fed decision and the BOJ’s commitment to its current BOJ rates policy. The muted movements reflect market uncertainty and a wait-and-see approach. For both crypto enthusiasts and Forex traders, understanding these dynamics is essential. The interplay of global central bank policies, interest rates , and broader economic trends will continue to shape the landscape of currency markets , including Asia FX . Patience, informed analysis, and proactive risk management will be crucial for navigating the weeks and months ahead. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping US Dollar liquidity.

title: Best Crypto to Buy Now As Polymarket Predicts Fed To End Quantitative Tightening
body: The crypto-based betting platform Polymarket now shows a 100% likelihood that the U.S. Federal Reserve will end its Quantitative Tightening (QT) before May. The odds have soared from just 30% earlier this month to certainty, as Donald Trump’s volatile tariff policy and the ensuing trade war have heightened concerns about imminent stagflation and recession. Meanwhile, interest rate traders are now pricing in three rate cuts this year, up from just one earlier, according to CME FedWatch data. The end of QT and imminent rate cuts could inject fresh liquidity into risk assets, potentially fueling the next leg of the crypto bull run. Will The Fed End Quantitative Tightening In April? Polymarket bettors are certain that the US Fed will end its QT program before its May FOMC meeting. Quantitative Tightening (QT) is a monetary policy tool used by central banks, such as the Federal Reserve, to reduce the money supply in the economy. The scheme involves offloading assets from the Fed’s balance sheet or letting them mature without reinvestment, effectively draining liquidity from the financial system. Together with interest rate hikes, QT is an effective tool to curb high inflation levels in the economy. While the Fed has already started to reduce its benchmark interest rates, it has continued with its monetary tightening. In February’s Congressional testimony , Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell claimed that the market industry hasn’t shrunk enough and that the central bank is in no rush to pause its balance sheet wind down. However, the central bank may soon have to revise its course, owing to Donald Trump’s volatile tariff policy. The White House is aggressively seeking a trade war with its major trading partners, sparking concerns regarding a potential recession or stagflation. Neither Trump nor Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent has dismissed concerns about a potential recession, both showing receptiveness to short-term pain. The Fed may need to adopt a more dovish monetary policy to offset the administration’s hawkishness. Moreover, the inflation in the US economy is dwindling, with February’s CPI and PPI data coming lower than expected. Truflation , a new popular real-time measure of inflation, actually shows that the US inflation is currently at 1.65%, below the Fed’s 2% target. It is, therefore, not a surprise that Polymarket bettors are considering it a certainty that the Fed will end its QT in April, a decidedly bullish event for the crypto market. Will The Bitcoin Price Hit $150,000 Following The Fed’s Dovish Pivot? The end of QT as well as the imminent interest rate cuts are expected to inject fresh liquidity into risk assets, paving the way for the next crypto bull market. Inflation is crashing. QT is ending. The dollar is tanking. Long term yields are falling. Global M2 is breaking out to all time highs. The US Government wants to buy as much BTC as they can. And Bitcoin is still trading for $82,000. Explain to me again why I should be bearish. — Mike Alfred (@mikealfred) March 18, 2025 Global Liquidity is entering the next bullish phase in its long-term cycle, which is already extremely bullish for Bitcoin. Meanwhile, the Global M2 money supply has hit a new all-time high. A dovish Fed now could provide the spark that could send Bitcoin and other large-cap assets to new all-time highs. Fundstrat’s Tom Lee projects that the Bitcoin price could hit $150,000 in 2025. Best Crypto To Buy Now Considering the possibility of an explosive bull rally, Bitcoin remains one of the best cryptos to buy. If Tom Lee’s projection pans out, investors buying today could get a clean 2x opportunity. Meanwhile, smart money investors aren’t giving up on Ethereum as well. Whales have purchased billions in $ETH despite the broader market uncertainty. Whales have bought more than 420,000 #Ethereum $ETH in the last five days! pic.twitter.com/ZFF57gbq0e — Ali (@ali_charts) March 14, 2025 Similarly, the meme coin market leader Dogecoin is seeing heavy whale investments, prominent analyst Ali Martinez reveals. Typically, whale investments are an excellent tool for investors to create their own lists of best cryptos to buy. For instance, whales continue to invest six figures in Solaxy (SOLX) , the first prominent Solana layer-2 coin, which has already raised nearly $27 million in its ICO. Armed with ZK proofs, data availability tools like Celestia and Hyperlane-powered multi-chain bridge, Solaxy’s layer-2 scaling solution promises to tackle the network congestion issues on Solana, even during periods of heavy traffic. Considering that the top Bitcoin and Ethereum L2s have multi-billion dollar valuations, it is no surprise that early SOLX buyers are viewing it as the next 100x crypto. title: Binance Expands Support For StraitsX (XUSD) & This Crypto, Here’s All
body: Cryptocurrency exchange giant Binance again captured substantial market attention with its latest update on StraitsX USD (XUSD) and Four (FORM) coins this Wednesday. The exchange announced that it is expanding market support for these assets by adding them to its stockpile of trade offerings ahead. In an upshot, traders and investors extensively eye these crypto to capitalize on emerging market opportunities. Binance Reveals Market Support For XUSD & FORM In an official Binance release on March 19, the crypto exchange outlined that it is adding the abovementioned assets to the ‘Simple Earn, Buy Crypto, Convert, Margin, Auto-Invest, and Futures trading’ divisions. The platform’s colossal user base is primed to witness XUSD and FORM listing on ‘Simple Earn’ starting the announcement date at 08:00 UTC. Further, users can buy these assets via VISA, MasterCard, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and Revolut, underlining the CEX’s vast offerings. In addition, trading against BTC, USDT, and other cryptos supported on the ‘Convert’ division at zero fees within one hour of the coins’ spot listing will also be supported. In an announcement earlier this week, the top crypto exchange notified that the StraitsX listing is at 08:00 UTC on the abovementioned date. What’s More For Traders In The Binance Announcement? FORM/USDT crypto pair will further be added as a new borrowable asset on ‘Cross and Isolated Margin.’ This offering will launch on the abovementioned date at 08:20 UTC. Also, futures trading for FORMUSDT will commence at 08:00 UTC. Traders can enjoy up to 50x leverage on the crypto’s USD-Margined futures contract facilitated by the exchange. More About The Cryptos Notably, StraitsX is a major stablecoin provider backed by the MAS (Monetary Authority Of Singapore). XUSD is a stablecoin pegged to the U.S. Dollar and runs atop Ethereum and Binance Smart Chain blockchains. As of press time, the total supply for the stablecoin was 26.35 million tokens. Each XUSD is backed by reserve assets maintained at more than or equal to 100% of the value in circulation. FORM price gained nearly 2% in the past 24 hours and exchanged hands at $1.79. The coin hit an intraday low and high of $1.54 and $1.80, respectively. It’s worth pointing out that Four is a rebranded and token-swapped version of BinaryX (BNX). Overall, the CEX continues to cement its global rankings with top-notch offerings for traders. Intriguingly, CoinGape previously reported that Binance also unveiled support for MKR, EPIC, DF, GMX, and RPL, adding to its optimistic market endeavors. The post Binance Expands Support For StraitsX (XUSD) & This Crypto, Here’s All appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Community slams Crypto.com CEO over 70B CRO re-issuance
body: Major cryptocurrency exchange Crypto.com came under fire following an allegedly manipulated vote leading to a massive token burn reversal on Crypto.com’s Cronos blockchain. Crypto.com CEO Kris Marszalek took to X on March 19 to highlight the firm’s financial and regulatory stability amid the ongoing controversy over the 70 billion Cronos ( CRO ) token re-issuance. Essentially canceling the 70 billion CRO token burn announced in 2021, the vote on bringing back the tokens has triggered outrage from the community, with many commentators criticizing the CEO for not addressing the issue in his new thread on X. “So you made $1 billion profit but needed to mine 70 billion CRO instead of using those funds to buy some off the market and help your core community remain positive,” one commentator wrote. Source: Crypto.com CEO Kris Marszalek “The largest token burn in history” In February 2021, a now-deleted Crypto.com post disclosed in February 2021 in a now-deleted post on the Crypto.com blog that the 70 billion CRO token burn was called the “largest token burn in history” with a goal to “fully decentralize the network” at the CRO mainnet launch. “Aligned with our belief, and with the CRO chain mainnet launch just around the corner, we are fully decentralizing the chain network,” the blog post said, announcing an immediate burn of 59.6 billion tokens. A screenshot from a now-deleted Crypto.com blog post on the 70 billion CRO token burn. Source: Archive.today Following the immediate 59.6 billion CRO burn, 0.4 billion of the remaining tokens were directed to monthly burns, while another 5.9 billion CRO was sent to block rewards, and 0.9 billion CRO was allocated to Particle B for chain ecosystem development. Why reverse the burn? In four years following the burn, a Cronos blog post on March 2 announced a vote on the creation of a Cronos Strategic Reserve by reversing the 2021 token burn. “In 2021, 70 billion CRO were burnt in one of the most significant burn transactions in history. Under today’s proposal, an equal number of tokens will be re-issued on Cronos POS into a Cronos Strategic Reserve escrow wallet, bringing the total supply back to the initial supply of 100 billion CRO,” the announcement said. An excerpt from Cronos’ vote proposal on reversing the 2021 CRO token burn. Source: Cronos Launched on March 3, the vote received lots of negative feedback from the community on social media, with many posters urging that the CRO re-issuance was the “opposite of what this community wants.” Related: Binance announces community voting mechanism for token listings “I hope that people vote against this, this is a terrible idea,” one commenter said . Last-minute voters approved re-issuance Despite notable community backlash, the vote results came in favor of a Cronos Strategic Reserve, spurring controversy and speculation over alleged vote manipulation. “Totally manipulation to come in at the last minute and vote yes, the CDC [crypto dot com] is as centralized as a blockchain can be, and shouldn’t be since there’s no real governance when 70% of the voting power is in the CDC,” one GitHub commentator wrote . CRO governance voting results show 70% support from the community. Source: Mintscan According to Laura Shin’s Unchained sources, Crypto.com allegedly controls 70-80% of the total voting power, essentially removing the need for any governance vote at all. Following the massive backlash, Crypto.com announced an ask-me-anything event coming on March 25, with the CRO token burn apparently becoming the main issue on the agenda. “Looking forward to catching up with our community on Tuesday,” Crypto.com CEO said in a March 19 post on X, adding the hashtag “MakeCROGreatAgain.” Cointelegraph approached Crypto.com for a comment regarding the burn reversal but did not receive a response at the time of publication. title: The Mythos Foundation brings MYTH staking on Mythos Chain
body: The Mythos Foundation (MYTH), the Web3 gaming platform, has officially launched MYTH token staking on the Mythos Chain, according to the reports shared with Finbold on Wednesday, March 19. The staking initiative, which began on March 10, has already seen more than 30 million MYTH tokens staked, and participants will share 50 million MYTH in rewards over the next year. Have you staked your MYTH yet? We've allocated 50M MYTH from our treasury as rewards to be distributed over the next 12 months. You can stake right now on https://t.co/fJgiEMpmYa and accumulate rewards with a current APY of over 200%! pic.twitter.com/ruh2BRqfPY — Enter the Mythos (@EnterTheMythos) March 13, 2025 Democratizing Web3 gaming Designed for Web3 gaming , Mythos Chain offers a scalable infrastructure powered by the Mythos Foundation and its decentralized autonomous organization (DAO). Thanks to the MYTH staking update, the community can now actively support the network’s decentralized node system while benefiting from token incentives. To keep inflation down, staking rewards come from the Mythos Foundation treasury itself, not new token issuance. Moreover, given that gas fees on Mythos Chain are burned, any increase in network activity will also lead to an increase in token burns. Mythical Games Chief Financial Officer (CFO), Kasper Jørgensen, commented on the growing engagement with the platform in the light of new staking features: “We’re excited to support the launch of MYTH staking by the Mythos Foundation and frankly, have been impressed by the level of engagement in the first 48 hours. This is only the beginning of what’s in store for Mythos Chain in the year ahead as Mythos continues building an ecosystem that will host the future of gaming for companies like Mythical.” MYTH staking and utility To participate in MYTH staking, users can use Subwallet or Nova Wallet. Staked tokens accrue rewards daily and can be claimed at any time, while unstaking has a three-day cooldown. Reward rates depend on the number of delegators per collator (currently estimated at ~30%). In addition to staking, MYTH also acts as a governance token, fuels gas transactions, and facilitates in-game asset trading on the Mythical Marketplace . The post The Mythos Foundation brings MYTH staking on Mythos Chain appeared first on Finbold .

title: EOS Price Surges 30% Amid Rebrand, But Scammers Target Holders: What’s Happening?
body: Amid the market’s bear struggle, the EOS blockchain network’s token price attains an unexpected rally. EOS has been struggling for years, losing more than 100% of its value from ATH, but things have changed today, as it surged 32% within hours. Although the price remains 97% down from the peak, this gain is significant, leaving investors curious, especially as scammer activity around the blockchain network seems high. Let’s discuss. Why is the EOS Price Surging Today? The EOS blockchain network recently announced its rebranding to Vaulta on March 18, 2025, and it has been strategically shifting towards Web3 banking. This rebranding was more critical as the EOS token lost traction due to regulatory and governance challenges and network congestion issues. Despite its launch as the Ethereum killer and high popularity, the network and its native token struggled against other blockchains. Although the transition is scheduled for May 2025, the investors’ sentiments were influenced, resulting in a surge in the EOS worth. Soon after the rebranding news and revelation of the swapping of EOS to a new Vaulta token at a 1:1 ratio, the EOS’s value began to surge. EOS chart reveals it jumped from $0.49 to $0.65 within a few hours. However, despite the surge, it remains 97% down. Interestingly, the difference may continue to rise as the scammer begins to target the holders. Scammers Address Poisoning Attack Looms Amid the excitement of the EOS price rally, holders face major scam threats. The security firm SlowMist warned the holders of the fraudulent actors using the address positioning scheme, where they send 0.001 EOS transactions to users. More importantly, they do this with fake addresses resembling legitimate trading platforms to seem real, and the user makes the transition to the wrong addresses. Such crypto scams are quite common in the trading industry, where scammers trick investors into copy-pasting the wrong address, resulting in the wrong fund transfers. This also builds serious theft concerns, indirectly connecting to declining investor interest and price drops. Will The EOS Price Rally Continue? The EOS token has entered a significant downtrend, losing 10% since the peak of $0.65. It currently trades at $0.5816 with a market capitalization of $903.64M. This decline occurred as sellers became active in the market. Notably, scammers also affected investors’ sentiments. Besides, Jerome Powell’s speech is also influencing the performance of digital assets today. Amid this volatile market, the EOS price rally is at risk. Buyer dominance and market recovery are a must for the continuity of this rally. The post EOS Price Surges 30% Amid Rebrand, But Scammers Target Holders: What’s Happening? appeared first on CoinGape .

title: Critical Ripple (XRP) Development: Potential Price Implications?
body: According to the X account that tracks the supply of newly minted RLUSD, Ripple has recently created another 25 million coins, readying the protocol for additional liquidity. RLUSD was one of the most highly anticipated developments in the Ripple ecosystem. It’s designed to be a regulated stablecoin, and its floating supply is currently available on both Ethereum and the company’s own blockchain, the XRP Ledger (XRPL). At the time of this writing, around $125 million worth of RLUSD circulates on Ethereum and about $44 million – on XRPL. While the numbers might appear odd, they do make sense from a business perspective. DeFi on XRPL is yet to take off, while Ethereum remains the most liquid network for decentralized applications, regardless of the recent slumps in the price of its native cryptocurrency. But will the newly minted $25 million RLUSD affect XRP’s price? After all, they account for around 15% of the entire supply of the stablecoin. Well, they haven’t so far. XRP is trading at around $2.32 at the time of this writing, increasing by about 1.6% in the past 24 hours. Source: CoinGecko This uptick, though, is likely attributable to the general market increase at the same time, and it’s not isolated to XRP – this can be seen in the charts for all coins. That said, a continuous acceptance of Ripple’s stablecoin is definitely a potential catalyst for future growth in XRP’s price. After all, it could generate more revenue for the company. With a circulating supply of only about $170 million, RLUSD is nowhere near the likes of USDT or USDC, but this could also be seen as a potential growth trajectory. The post Critical Ripple (XRP) Development: Potential Price Implications? appeared first on CryptoPotato .
